subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alfredo Aceves, a right-hander who went 10-1 with a 3.54 earned run average for the Yankees during their 2009 title run, has been a jack of all trades for the Red Sox this season.
snippet: Alfredo Aceves, a right-hander who went 10-1 with a 3.54 earned run average for the Yankees during their 2009 title run, has been a jack of all trades for the Red Sox this season.
